text: The Statue of Liberty National Monument is a national monument of the United States. It is made up of two islands: Ellis Island and Liberty Island. The Statue of Liberty is included because it is on Liberty Island. This national monument was created in 1924. At first, it included only the Statue of Liberty. In 1965, Ellis Island was added. In 1966, Liberty Island was added. ==References== ==Other websites== *Statue of Liberty National Monument The official Historical Site handbook. Category:National Register of Historic Places Category:National Monuments of the United States Category:1924 establishments in the United States
title: Statue of Liberty National Monument
